body:
Hi Chris Buntine
There is only a problem with the open brep that you have put inside "_geometry". Its normal is wrong. If you flip the open brep, your file works fine. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/DYswKX9FwiTZFIB8S7Rqpin9IDoESlreK*rZ5D8Lrh6M35IfYhK5-ri0dEZN0piILdbRwhDK4ri7o*kU*uC7eQglqc0XTUTC/shade.png) Bests Antonello
